Name: Estes
Ingredients: 15 ml Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)
Instructions: MUDDLE raspberries in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into glass filled with crushed ice.
Review: This rich, fruity long drink is a real crowd pleaser.
History: Created in 2005 by Henry Besant and Andres Masso, London, England, and named in honour of Tomas Estes.
